content.rendered:
Creator Daisuke Tsutsumi

Directed by Daisuke ‘Dice’ Tsutsumi. Hikari Toriumi. Erick Oh

Written by Emily Brundige. Bradley Furnish. Mari Okada. Daisuke ‘Dice’ Tsutsumi

Cast Momona Tamada( Onari4 episodes, 2022 ). Craig Robinson( Naridon4 episodes, 2022 ). Archie Yates( Kappa4 episodes, 2022 ). Brittany Ishibashi( Amaten4 episodes, 2022 ). Anna Akana( Ann-Brella / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Charlet Takahashi Chung( Tanukinta / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Robert Kondo( Hage / …4 episodes, 2022 ). George Takei( Mr. Tengu4 episodes, 2022 ). Omar Benson Miller( Putaro3 episodes, 2022 ). Tantoo Cardinal( Principal3 episodes, 2022 ). Miyuki Sawashiro( Emi3 episodes, 2022 ). Seth Carr( Calvin2 episodes, 2022 ). Yuki Matsuzaki( Tanukinta Papa2 episodes, 2022)

Language English. Japanese

Producers Megan Bartel. Robert Kondo. Kane Lee. Sara K. Sampson. Daisuke ‘Dice’ Tsutsumi. Hiroki Ito. Noriko Matsumoto. Yuriko Okada

Production Tonko House.

Certificate PG

Official site Official Netflix

Season 1

Total Episodes 4
